title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 11 December 2008 - XWiki
content:
xwikibot - (11/12/2008 08:06): Drafts.WebDAVDavfs was modified by xwiki:XWiki.asiri - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/WebDAVDavfs  
xwikibot - (11/12/2008 08:06): Drafts.WebDAVDavfs was modified by xwiki:XWiki.asiri - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/WebDAVDavfs  
xwikibot - (11/12/2008 08:07): XWiki.XWikiAllGroup was modified by xwiki:XWiki.RaffaelloPelagalli - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/XWikiAllGroup  
xwikibot - (11/12/2008 08:07): XWiki.stest was modified by XWiki.VincentMassol (deleted document) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/stest  
xwikibot - (11/12/2008 08:09): Drafts.WebDAVDavfs was modified by xwiki:XWiki.asiri - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/WebDAVDavfs  
gwash - (11/12/2008 11:43): i'm getting this error from tomcat6+(sun)jdk6+mysql5+xwiki1.7: http://pastebin.com/m345dca83  
gwash - (11/12/2008 11:44): tried turning migration off, but it still throws the same error  
gwash - (11/12/2008 11:44): the named queries bit, not hibernate  
jvdrean - (11/12/2008 11:58): gwash: you get this at startup ?  
gwash - (11/12/2008 11:59): jvdrean: yes  
jvdrean - (11/12/2008 12:00): is it a fresh install ? upgrade form version x.x ?  
gwash - (11/12/2008 12:01): this is a new tomcat container, the one running the current wiki is tomcat5.5 with xwiki 1.7 MS1  
gwash - (11/12/2008 12:02): it is an upgrade, though  
gwash - (11/12/2008 12:03): jvdrean ^  
asyd - (11/12/2008 14:19): funny  
asyd - (11/12/2008 14:19):         #if($troubi =="oui")  
asyd - (11/12/2008 14:19): in XWiki/Results :)  
asyd - (11/12/2008 14:31): the Results page is very strange  
asyd - (11/12/2008 14:31): I mean  
asyd - (11/12/2008 14:31): here are some french words  
asyd - (11/12/2008 14:32): http://pastealacon.com/1839  
asyd - (11/12/2008 14:32): not really clean imho  
xwikibot - (11/12/2008 14:37): XWiki.dan was modified by XWiki.dan (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/dan  
radex - (11/12/2008 14:45): hi  
radex - (11/12/2008 14:47): i'm traing performance xwiki on the base installation with default xar.. i'm running simple ab - apache  benchmark with fallowing options   
radex - (11/12/2008 14:47): ab -n 20 -c 20 http://localhost/xwiki/bin/view/Main/  
radex - (11/12/2008 14:48): median time it is 1343ms .. it is posible when i have enable all caching settings?  
radex - (11/12/2008 14:48): ps. i'm testing it on jetty and tomcat with postgres database - for sure this is not database problem only java   
radex - (11/12/2008 14:49): xwiki.store.cache=1  
radex - (11/12/2008 14:49): xwiki.store.cache.capacity=5000  
asyd - (11/12/2008 14:49): 1343ms for a page?  
radex - (11/12/2008 14:49): xwiki.render.cache.capacity=1000  
radex - (11/12/2008 14:49): asyd: yep but 20 concurent requests  
radex - (11/12/2008 14:50): to one page i have ~160ms  
radex - (11/12/2008 14:50): i mean one request   
radex - (11/12/2008 14:52): You know when i run in on the production host then 20/30 pleople will kill xwiki, so i'm thinking if i have corect caching configuration   
asyd - (11/12/2008 14:52): which jvm seeettings?  
radex - (11/12/2008 14:52): or this is normal timing   
radex - (11/12/2008 14:52):  -server -Xms128m -Xmx1024m -XX:MaxPermSize=128m  
asyd - (11/12/2008 14:53): well, dunno your kind of wiki, but you can enable cache   
asyd - (11/12/2008 14:53): (renedering)  
radex - (11/12/2008 14:53): i have tested it the same on setting from http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/Performances..  
radex - (11/12/2008 14:53): you mean:  
radex - (11/12/2008 14:53): ## cache all rendered documents for one hour  
radex - (11/12/2008 14:53): xwiki.rendering.defaultCacheDuration=3600  
radex - (11/12/2008 14:54): ?  
radex - (11/12/2008 14:55): i have setuped xwiki.store.cache=1,xwiki.store.cache.capacity=5000,xwiki.render.cache.capacity=1000,xwiki.plugin.image.cache.capacity=30  
radex - (11/12/2008 14:55): in wiki.cfg  
asyd - (11/12/2008 14:56): radex: can you try to add the following line in your homepage:  
asyd - (11/12/2008 14:57): $context.setCacheDuration(60)  
asyd - (11/12/2008 14:57): and retry an anb (just for wondering)  
asyd - (11/12/2008 14:57): and btw, you should know that i'am \*not\* a xwiki developper, so all what I say are probably wrong :)  
radex - (11/12/2008 14:58): ah to the soruce, ok i will check soon   
asyd - (11/12/2008 15:15): radex: so ? :)  
dan\_miron - (11/12/2008 15:48): hi guys, does anybody know where the radeox macros are implemented within the platform?  
radex - (11/12/2008 15:49): asyd: a bit better 20 requests 1024 (longest request)  
radex - (11/12/2008 15:49): was 1343ms  
asyd - (11/12/2008 15:49): hmm ok  
jvdrean - (11/12/2008 15:55): dan\_miron: see com.xpn.xwiki.render.macro in core  
dan\_miron - (11/12/2008 15:59): tnx, jvdrean  
gwash - (11/12/2008 16:01): wow 1.7 is lighting fast  
gwash - (11/12/2008 16:01): about importing the new XAR, should i just rename modified docs, or what?  
asyd - (11/12/2008 16:36): hmmmm  
asyd - (11/12/2008 16:36): is there a way to have access to an object's properties without having access to the page?  
xwikibot - (11/12/2008 17:09): XWiki.tjordanchat was modified by XWiki.tjordanchat (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/tjordanchat  
asyd - (11/12/2008 20:25): anyone? I have some questions about xwiki watch
